name: Farro Salad
recipeIngredient: 1 carrot, peeled and cut into large pieces
2 dried guindilla peppers or 1 dried ancho pepper
1/2 cup fontina cheese, cut into 1/2-inch dice
1 head radicchio, cut into bite-size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: In a large, heavy-bottomed pot, combine the farro, carrot, onion, garlic, guindilla or ancho pepper, bay leaf, kosher salt and 4 cups of water. Cover, place over high heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, and simmer until the grain is soft and cooked through, 20 to 25 minutes. Drain well, and discard the carrot, onion, garlic, peppers and bay leaf.
Mix cheese, butter and radicchio into the farro. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve warm.
